title: News24.com | No entry into Thailand as country steps up coronavirus measures
description: Thailand barred entry into the kingdom, enacting sweeping emergency powers in a bid to stem the local spread of the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
Thailand barred entry into the kingdom late on Wednesday, enacting sweeping emergency powers in a bid to stem the local spread of the coronavirus outbreak. 
The measures, which stopped short of a full lockdown after days of vacillation by the government, are… [+1284 chars]
